UPCOMING EVENTS
UPCOMING EVENTS
UPCOMING EVENTS
UPCOMING EVENTS AT INTRACOASTAL
Bonsai Workshop At Intracoastal
We're teaming up with L&J Plant Nursery to bring you a hands-on bonsai experience like no other!
Your ticket includes:
A 90-minute bonsai class
Your own bonsai tree to style and take home
Bonsai shears (yepâ€”you keep them!)
2 delicious drinks from Intracoastal
Grab your tickets
HERE!
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for more event updates!
Oktoberfest & Pup-toberfest!
Itâ€™s Time to â€˜Fest!
Saturday, September 27th
Oktoberfest is right around the corner and weâ€™re partnering with
Touch of Grey Rescue
for a full day of celebration.
Kick off the day with your pups. Enjoy a vendor market dedicated to dogs, raffles, bingo, Touch of Grey merchandise, and a festive costume contest.
The festivities continue throughout the day with German-inspired beer, food,
Grab the full lineup for Oktoberfest
here
!
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for special event sneak peeks!
12 Years of Great Beers!
ðŸŽ‰ Weâ€™re turning 12! ðŸŽ‰
Join us Saturday, October 4th for our
12th Anniversary
celebration - an all-day party packed with Live Music, Intra Eats, special Intra Beer Releases, and more surprises along the way.
Mark your calendars and stay tuned for details. We canâ€™t wait to celebrate with you!
Want to stay up to date with event details? Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for all the sneak peeks!
Intracoastal Sunday Market
Mark your calendars for November 9th from 12 - 4pm. Rain or shine - itâ€™s market time!
Come grab a cold pint and shop from over 25+ amazing local vendors, and stick around post-market for Live Tunes in the beer garden - follow along
HERE
for more details and updates!
Are you a local vendor interested in joining us at an upcoming market? Reach out to Tammie at Tammie@intracoastalbrewingcompany.com
Want to stay up to date with event details? Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for all the sneak peeks!
11th Annual Rocky Water Brew Fest
Experience the taste of Floridaâ€™s Finest Craft Beer at the 11th Annual Rocky Water Brew Fest!
Rocky Water Brew Fest is presented to you by the Eau Gallie Rotary Club. You can enjoy
unlimited tastings
with your ticket to the event.
Find a new favorite brew this November!
Grab your tickets
HERE!
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for more event updates!
The Rocky Water Brew Fest will take place in the heart of the Eau Gallie Arts District at the Eau Gallie Square, on November 15th, 2025.
We apologize for any inconvenience, but children, strollers, or pets will not be allowed to enter the ticketed area of Rocky Water Brew Fest. No exceptions.
WEEKLY EVENTS AT INTRACOASTAL
Monday Night Trivia
Put your general knowledge to the test at Monday Night Trivia at Intracoastal Brewing Company!
Join us at 7:00 PM for a fun-filled night hosted by Trivia Nation - itâ€™s free to play, and there are prizes up for grabs every week
Gather your crew, grab a pint, and letâ€™s see who takes home the bragging rights!
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
for updates on special themed Trivia Nights weâ€™ll also feature throughout the year!
Wednesday - Intra Run Club
Intra Run Club has been going strong since November 2015 and is the largest run club in Brevard County! Join us every Wednesday at 5:45 PM (5:30 in the fall/winter) for a 1-mile or 3-mile run, jog, or walk over the Eau Gallie Causewayâ€”starting and ending at Intracoastal Brewing Company.
âœ… Every 10 runs = a free beer!
âœ… Check in with Amy when you arrive to make sure your run counts.
âœ… Sign-in available below!
Sign in online the day of the run here ->
https://get.mndbdy.ly/Ryfw5aIDSQb
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
and join our Intra Active Community Page for updates ->
https://www.facebook.com/groups/intraactive
Sunday - Yoga & Pint
Namaste For One More has been flowing with Yogi Perogi at Intracoastal Brewing Company since January 2014! Join us every Sunday at 10:45 AM for a relaxing yoga session followed by a well-earned pint.
ðŸ“ Location: Inside the brewery or in the biergarten (weather permitting)
ðŸ’° Cost: $15 cash / $18 card (pay in advance or at the door)
ðŸ§˜â€â™‚ï¸ What to bring? Your own mat!
Sign up online the week of the event here ->
https://checkout.square.site/merchant/6QWJ8M88ESPTR/checkout/JRPNGRHUVWQ6I6LLARIXSQAD
Follow us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
and join our Intra Active Community Page for updates on class schedule changes ->
https://www.facebook.com/groups/intraactive

Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates on whatâ€™s hop-pening at Intracoastal.

Sign Up

Contact Us.
General Inquiries / Musician Booking
Intracoastal Gives Back.
Intracoastal Brewing Company takes pride in supporting the communityâ€™s local causes, and we try to help as much as possible. However, we must adhere to a specific philanthropic budget. Due to the high volume of inquiries we receive, we are unable to grant every request for donation.
How We Operate
We ONLY review non-profit organizations that can provide proof of documentation and registration.
All donation and sponsorship requests must be submitted no later than 45 calendar days before your organizationâ€™s event or requested date of contribution.
All requests must be submitted through the form below. We will respectfully decline requests via mailed documents, social media or phone call.
Organizations selected for donation will only receive one donation per calendar year.
We Respectfully Decline
Requests for personal or corporate profit
Sports teams, bands and/or independent musicians
Any school functions or events involving children â€“ even if the children are not present during the event.
Thank you for your interest in Intracoastal Brewing Company. If your request is selected, you will be notified by phone call or email.
Please
click to download
our form for donation consideration.
Completed forms should be scanned or saved as a PDF document, and emailed back to us at info@IntracoastalBrewingCompany.com
